creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: building with cone-shaped gold dome in background center; buildings and palm trees glowing orange in sunset in middle ground; two water buffalo in water in foreground, with figures walking through a grey archway; pink sky; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
title: Rangoon
